synonyms: yadyapiha—although; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; koṭī-samudra-gambhīra—as deep as millions of oceans; nānā—various; bhāva—of ecstatic emotions; candrodaye—because of the moonrise; hayena—sometimes becomes; asthira—restless.
translation: Although Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu is as deep and grave as millions of oceans, when the moon of His various emotions rises, He becomes restless.
